verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A lily,
In the midst of thorns.
The King of Kings,
Adorns you.
Your feet are cleansed,
As you walk,
Trusting Him
Who found you.
Chorus:
You are called
To do His will.
In the land
Beneath your feet.
The Lord delights
In this land.
It is called,
Married.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
A lamb,
In the midst of wolves.
The Lord of Lords,
Surrounds you.
Your feet are cleansed,
As you walk,
Trusting Him
Who found you.
